item.title: [RBX1][Dedicated Servers] - 12C04
item.description:
Dec 13, 08:49 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 13/12/2022 08:17 UTC
End Time : 13/12/2022 08:46 UTC
Root cause : An electrical disjunction caused the incident.
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Dec 13, 08:41 UTC
Identified - Root cause : An electrical disjunction caused the incident.
Ongoing actions : Our teams are still working to solve the problem.

Dec 13, 08:26 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 13/12/2022 08:17 UTC
Service impact : Public network is temporarily unavailable for rack 12C04
Ongoing actions : Investigating
Our technical teams are working on the issue. Update will be post as significant progress is made.
